Sure! Here are 8 steps to help you modernize the website and introduce an app for Coffee Rock Bagel:

1. Determine the features of the website and app: Determine the features that the website and app will have. This may include a menu, ordering capabilities, online payments, store locations, customer reviews, and loyalty programs.
2. Choose a website and app development platform: Choose a website and app development platform that is user-friendly, reliable, and customizable. Research and compare different options to choose the one that best fits your business needs and budget.
3. Design the website and app: Develop a design for the website and app that is consistent with the Coffee Rock Bagel brand and is easy to use. Make sure the design is optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
4. Integrate the website and app with your POS system: Ensure that the website and app are integrated with your POS system. This will allow orders placed through the website and app to be processed seamlessly and in real-time.
5. Test the website and app: Test the website and app thoroughly before launching them to the public. Ensure that all features are working correctly and that the user experience is smooth and efficient.
6. Promote the website and app: Promote the website and app to your customers through various channels such as social media, email marketing, and in-store signage. Highlight the benefits of using the website and app, such as convenience, faster service, and loyalty programs.
7. Monitor website and app performance: Monitor the performance of the website and app on a regular basis. Track metrics such as website traffic, app downloads, and customer reviews. Use this data to identify areas for improvement and optimize the website and app for maximum performance.
8. Continuously improve and refine the website and app: Continuously improve and refine the website and app based on customer feedback and performance data. Make adjustments to features, design, and functionality to maximize customer engagement and retention.
